TopicTitle: Engine exhaust cone object appears to cover splash VFX from water landings

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5900X | GPU: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti | RAM: 64 GB DDR4

 

Title. Please check the image if anything is unclear. Testing is simple, not sure if it's just the NERV, or if it affects all engines. To recreate, just take a NERV, and splash around in the water. If you get the angle right, you can place the exhaust between your camera and the splash. Not sure if this is something that could possibly be done, but perhaps changing the splash to a Unity point cloud could be visually better.

can confirm this also affects other engines. effect happens both when engines are firing and when theyre inactive
